name: Landscaping
summary: Climate-smart planting plans, irrigation tuning, and outdoor environments that thrive year-round.
heroTitle: Transform your outdoor spaces with sustainable landscaping pros
heroCopy: From xeriscaping to native planting refreshes, we connect you with specialists who balance aesthetics, ecology, and maintenance needs.
benefits: Curated network of native plant designers and irrigation engineers
Sustainable material sourcing with transparent pricing guidance
Personalized matches delivered within 24 hours so you can compare quotes quickly

subservices.name: Xeriscaping & Drought-Resistant Design
subservices.summary: Low-water landscapes optimized for the Southwest climate.

subservices.name: Irrigation Installation & Repair
subservices.summary: Smart irrigation systems tuned for efficiency and compliance.

subservices.name: Organic & Native Planting
subservices.summary: Pollinator-friendly palettes with seasonal color and soil health.

subservices.name: Sustainable Landscape Design
subservices.summary: Master plans balancing aesthetics, biodiversity, and budgets.

faqs.q: How fast can I get matched with a landscaping specialist?
faqs.a: Most projects receive introductions to 2-3 vetted landscape teams within 24 hours. Larger design-build scopes may include a discovery call first to align budgets and timelines.
